mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weather WHERE weatherDate = #{ weatherDate } AND province = #{ province }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weather(weatherDate, province, temp_min, temp_max, weather_id, weatherday) VALUES(#{ weatherDate }, #{ province }, #{ temp_min }, #{ temp_max }, #{ weather_id }, #{ weatherday })
mapper.update: UPDATE weather SET temp_min = #{ temp_min }, temp_max = #{ temp_max }, weather_id = #{ weather_id } WHERE weatherDate = #{ weatherDate } AND province = #{ province }
